messages.subject: "whisper-er" book?
messages.msgSnippet: I saw a news item tonight on the horse-whisperer guy and the work he s doing with a school in England and now in California, applying his gentle methods to
messages.messageBody:
I saw a news item tonight on the horse-whisperer guy and the work he's doing
with a school in England and now in California, applying his gentle methods to
children. It sounded a lot like what people talk about here. They mentioned a
book and I was wondering if he had a book about children (he and his wife
fostered approx. 42 children and used those gentle methods with those needy
kids), and if so, if anyone had read it, had any opinions on it and/or knew the
title ? Thanks.

Peace,
Sang


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
